scripts.pre:dist:mac: rm -rf app/bundled && mkdir app/bundled && cp ./app/vendor/ffmpeg/osx/ffmpeg app/bundled/
scripts.pre:dist:win64: rm -rf app/bundled && mkdir app/bundled && cp ./app/vendor/ffmpeg/win64/ffmpeg.exe app/bundled/
scripts.pre:dist:win32: rm -rf app/bundled && mkdir app/bundled && cp ./app/vendor/ffmpeg/win32/ffmpeg.exe app/bundled/
scripts.dist:mac: source .env && unset CSC_LINK && unset CSC_KEY_PASSWORD && npm run pre:dist:mac && build --platform=mac && npm run cleanup:dist
scripts.dist:win64: source .env && npm run pre:dist:win64 && build --platform=win32 --arch=x64 && npm run cleanup:dist
scripts.dist:win32: source .env && npm run pre:dist:win32 && build --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 && npm run cleanup:dist
scripts.release:mac: rm -rf release/osx && mkdir release/osx && cp -rv dist/{*.dmg,*-mac.zip} release/osx && PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat app/package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && echo $PACKAGE_VERSION >> ./release/osx/VERSION
scripts.release:win64: rm -rf release/win64 && mkdir release/win64 && cp -v dist/win/{RELEASES,*.nupkg,*.exe} release/win64
scripts.release:win32: rm -rf release/win32 && mkdir release/win32 && cp -v dist/win-ia32/{RELEASES,*.nupkg,*.exe} release/win32
scripts.s3_sync: source .env && PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat app/package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && aws s3 sync release/ s3://doodly/updates/$PACKAGE_VERSION/ --acl public-read && aws s3 sync s3://doodly/updates/$PACKAGE_VERSION/ s3://doodly/updates/latest/ --delete --acl public-read
scripts.deploy: npm run dist:mac && npm run release:mac && npm run dist:win64 && npm run release:win64 && npm run dist:win32 && npm run release:win32 && npm run post:release && npm run s3_sync
